column1: full and straying into the pads, Kishan, though, misses out on the scoring opportunity. Off the pad and wanders away through square leg for a leg bye
short and wide outside off, ample width for Baz to free his arms and announce himself. He nails a cut about 10 metres to the right of deep point. The ball thuds into the boundary
change-up. Slower full ball outside off, Baz is pinned to the crease as he swishes early.... and misses

another slower ball, 120ks, hoodwinks Baz. Nearly chips a catch to mid-on. Full on middle, Baz is through with the push before the ball arrived. The ball balloons in the air. Smith runs in from mid-on, dives forward, but the ball evades his outstretched right hand
hip-high short ball on off stump, swatted to deep midwicket
good length and angling away outside off, Baz opens the bat-face and guides it through the vacant cordon for four
full and slides in with the arm, Kishan squirts an inside edge towards midwicket
fractionally short and outside off, back-foot chop to point
skids in from around the wicket and pings the front pad. Kishan attempts to play across the line and does not make contact
risky, risky from Kishan. Slides on middle, Kishan looks to cut from the stumps, ends up limply chopping the ball to cover
speared on off stump, skids on, cramps 'em up for room. Kishan aims to force the ball and ends up getting a thick inside edge onto the pad
nearly 100ks, attacks the stumps again, pushed down to mid-on

hip-high short ball on off or just a shade outside off, you've got to get it up higher. Kishan gets on top of the bounce and pulls it away to the right of deep midwicket. The fielder collects the ball and throws it to Dhoni, who pulls off his signature between-the-legs flick onto the stumps. But Kishan is well in. The TV umpire confirms it
back of a length on middle and leg, tip and run to midwicket
short and rises on top of off, hops and fends to cover for one
short of a length and outside off, drags a pull over midwicket
another hip-high short ball, this is on middle stump, Kishan gets inside the line and pulls it in the air, clears deep square leg for the first six of the night
full offcutter outside off, Kishan spots it, plays late, opening the face and guiding it to short third man
short and angling across off stump, camps back and punches to the covers - one of the four men in the off-side ring
Baz makes room outside leg, this is on the leg stump, pushed to cover, he now gets the single
nearly 100ks, rushes Kishan. Skids on  flat from around the stumps, beats the pull, and thuds into the pad. But heading down
Kishan uses his feet, this is a 99ks straight ball outside off. Kishan drives away from the body, loses his balance, and an inside edge rolls past the stumps and into the fine leg boundary
too short and attached with width outside off, Kishan rocks back and smears it over square leg. Pulled away for another six
no room at all now. Flat and skids on middle, Kishan attempts a cut and gets it to point. He was cramped for room
really, really full on middle, near yorker, squeezed back to Stokes
full and just wide outside off, 143ks, Baz moves slightly outside leg and glides it in the gap between the keeper and short third man. Finesse
length ball on middle stump, ripe to be smacked. Baz clears his front leg and nails it over midwicket for his first six

Baz pre-meditates by stepping away outside leg. Stokes follows him with a full-toss. He adjusts and looks to guide it between the two men behind point. Christian dives to his left at backward point and intercepts the ball
off-stump yorker, 144ks, Kishan just about brings his bat down in time. Dug out to cover
slower ball, 116ks, very full and wide outside off, from around the wicket, asks Kishan to reach out for it. He does so, squeezing the ball to point
Baz moves away outside leg again, Tahir follows him with a flat one at his pads, quietly worked away to midwicket
skids on outside off, Kishan looks to force a pull. Ends up dragging an inside edge to midwicket
pushed through on middle, low full-toss at 100ks, swept away to the right of square leg for four
and another four. Tossed up full and wide outside off, flat-batted away to the right of a diving Smith at mid-off
slides outside off, Kishan looks to dab it down to third man. Beaten

Tahir provides Pune with the breakthrough and sets off <s>towards the other side of the experessway</s>. Catch him if you can. He gives it some air and pushes it pretty wide outside off. Kishan slashes and sends an outside edge straight to Sundar at short third man. Dolly catch
back of a length on middle and leg, these Pune bowlers keep denying Baz room. Tucked around the corner
Thakur tests Raina with a short ball outside off, Raina sits back, rides the bounce and pulls it to the right of deep square leg. Tripathi slides across and stops the ball
length ball angled across off stump, Raina opens the face and runs it down to third man
full and veering down the leg side, past the glance
flat-batted away past the right of a diving Smith at mid-off. Baz backs away and jumps down the track. Back of a length on off stump, clattered away
back of a length on off, follows violence with finesse. Drops a single to point with an open face
full on off, Raina hangs back and clips the ball away in the direction of deep square leg
tossed up outside off from over the wicket, Raina gets on the front foot and pushes it back to Tahir
straight ball on middle, Raina closes the face and works it in the gap at square leg for two
non-turning legbreak, full and outside off, driven down to long-on
Baz moves away outside leg, Tahir is aware of it and fires it on his pads. Tucked through square leg
slider outside off, fast and flat, Raina attempt to pull and ends up dragging the ball to midwicket

full on off from around the wicket, 'keeper, keeper' is the cry. Dhoni collects the throw, breaks the stumps, and the TV umpire is called in. Raina is caught short as the MCA Stadium breaks into chats of 'Dhoni! Dhoni! Dhoni! Raina sat back and worked in in the gap between square-ish long leg and deep midwicket. Raina goes for a double. Rahane throws it to Dhoni, flat and adjcaent to the stumps. Dhoni quickly swipes the bails off
slower ball outside off, stabbed away to point
wayward, full and down leg, left alone. Leg-side wide
back of a length on middle, backs away and hits it in the air, the ball lands well in front of long-on
length and outside off, slogged across the line to long-on
length ball, angled in on middle, Finch does not middle it. Drags it off the inside half over midwicket, and that's enough to fetch a boundary

111ks offcutter, bounces at Finch. He awkwardly fends it to point. Stokes swoops on the ball and aims a throw.Finch and Baz chance a single. Christian tumbles - possibly to give Stokes a clear view of the stumps at the bowler's end. Stokes misses it
back of a length on the off stump, Baz slugs it over the wide long-on boundary for a six
the googly, breaks in, Finch picks it, slog-sweeps with the turn over midwicket
Finch pre-meditates backs away outside leg, this is the legbreak, does not turn much. Driven from the stumps to long-off
Baz, with the floppy hat, backs away outside leg. Tahir dangles a legbreak wide outside off. Left alone
really full on the leg stump, jabbed down the ground to long-on

Chipped back to the bowler. This the regulation legbreak. Pitches around leg stump and breaks away a touch. A drop in pace from Tahir. Finch eyes up the leg side and plays early. He attempts a flick and watches the leading edge loop into the hands of Tahir

Tahir unleashes the googly and storms through the sweep of Smith. The pace is quicker, the trajectory is much flatter, Smith attempts to sweep it. He can't, Tahir leaves the stumps spread-eagled, and charges towards the third man boundary
full and wide outside off, reaches out and flashes to third man
length and outside off, guided to point
length and outside off, flat-batted away through the covers
full and outside off, Karthik opens the face and runs it down to third man
bouncer, 145ks, angled into Baz. He looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and half-sways away. He is hit on the shoulder. Glancing blow, they sneak a leg bye
follows the bouncer with a full one outside off, defensively played to cover
back of a length on leg stump, tucks him for room. Tucked towards the square leg umpire

an appeal for lbw, umpire Shamshuddin is unmoved. Karthik uses his feet, this is full and angled in on off and middle. Karthik misses a drive and is pinned on the front pad. It looks adjacent. The umpires gives it as runs as the ball rolls down to third man. Replays confirm no inside edge and it would have carried onto hit middle. Karthik gets away
full and outside off, Karthik drives on the up and sends it clattering away through extra cover
full and angled in, inside edged to square leg
Baz makes room by jumping outside leg. This is full on the stumps. He aims to hit it down the ground or over cover, but ends up toe-ending a catch to Rahane at deep point
just short of a good length and outside off, scythed away to point
full on off, clipped to leg for one
back of a length on leg stump, worked to midwicket
back of a length and just outside off, chopped away to third man
Jadeja comes down the track, nearly yorks himself but drills it down the ground past the outstretched right hand of Stokes
full and angled in on off, whipped with the wrists to midwicket
slower, short ball outside off, Jadeja picks it. Goes on the back foot and pulls it in the gap at deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, steered to point
full and wide outside off, Jadeja reaches out for the ball and sends an outside edge flying past backward point
another appeal for lbw, given as leg byes in the end. Karthik comes down the track and yorks himself. Hit on the front pad in front of middle. But the angle was taking it down leg
leg-sideish, Jadeja picks it off his pads and glances it away fine on the leg side for four
full on off stump, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
back of a length on off and middle, Jadeja hangs back and defends it back
slower full ball outside off, Karthik uses his feet and drives to sweeper
Karthik uses his feet again, this is slower than the previous ball, 107ks, short and grips in the surface. Swatted away to deep midwicket

Dhoni takes the bails off quickly again. The TV umpire is called in again, but Jadeja is safe. Full and angled in on the pads, worked away in the gap at square leg. Jadeja goes for two. Unadkat runs in, collects the ball, and throws it flat to Dhoni.Jadeja slides his bat in time
pitched up and outside off, crisply driven through the line to sweeper cover
hip-high short ball on middle, pulled away to Rahane at deep square leg
Top edged into the hands of short fine leg. Banged in short on off from around the wicket. Jadeja is tucked up for room. He looks to hook and watches the top edge balloon to Unadkat
regulation legbreak, full and outside off, driven on the front foot to cover
short on off stump, pulled down to long-on
very full on off, no turn, driven to long-on
flat skidder on middle, Karthik goes back and secures a single through cover
straight ball, back of a length on middle, Faulkner hangs back and turns it around the corner
full and straight on off, quicker than the previous one, driven down to long-on for one. Another fine outing for Tahir
good length on off, slower offcutter, clipped away through square leg
length and wide outside off, flat-batted away to the right of sweeper
another slower ball on middle, guided past point. A brief mix-up ensures, but they get the single
on the leg stump, off the pad and rolls towards short fine leg
Faulker feigns to back away outside leg, this on a back of a length on leg stump. Tucked towards square leg for one
slower ball on off, 109ks, it takes a long time to arrive. Karthik is already through with his pull. Beaten
back of a length and angling away outside off, jabbing drive to the left of short cover

straight to Tiwary at short cover. Unadkat gives his fielder the thumbs-up. Back of a length and angling away outside off, Faulkner, having backed away outside off, creates additional room, and slaps it straight to Tiwary
good length and angling across off, punched square through point
Karthik uses his feet, the bowler shortens his length outside off, pushed down the ground

Lions are in danger of being bowled out. Change-up. Front of the hand cutter, Sangwan has no clue about this. He drives early and skews it high. The ball drops into the hands of Tripathi running in from long-on
slower, short ball outside off, Karthik slashes and misses
wide yorker outside off, Thampi backs away and misses
Thampi ventures outside leg again, this is full and angled in. Thampi swings... and misses
Thampi uses his feet, gets an off-stump yorker, ends up digging the ball to midwicket
slower ball on off, Karthik forces it to long-on
Karthik comes down the track. Back of a length on leg stump, whipped in the air to the left of the leg umpire. First boundary since the 14th over
Karthik pre-meditates, shuffles across off. Stokes goes shorter and outside off. Karthik can't scoop it away. Beaten
slower ball on off from around the wicket, muscued over square leg
Karthik pre-meditates.Changes the grip and brings out the switch-hit. Slower offcutter, which is sent over point

Karthik shuffles across the off stump for a regulation sweep. This is a full toss, pins him in front of middle. This looks tight. Not given by the umpire. The two batsmen search for a leg bye. Unadkat runs in, and hits the stumps at the striker's end, but Thampi is in

another slower ball outside off, Thampi has a big swish at it... and misses. Now he has to go for the bye to get Karthik back on strike. Dhoni, having taken his right glove off, nails the stumps with an over-arm throw to catch Karthik short

and Gujarat Lions have been bowled out with one ball to go in their innings. Another slower ball. Back of a length. Soni aims to slug it over midwicket. He is already through with the shot. Unadkat hits middle and finishes off Lions
short of a length and outside off, stands tall and punches to point
straying onto the hips, easily glanced away fine. Fine leg is squarer as that's a four
back of a length on off stump defended to mid-on on the back foot

an appeal for leg-before. Umpire Erasmus raises his finger. Did it pitch in line? Replays confirm it pitched just outside leg. Very full and skids into Rahane, who sits back, plays across the line, and misses. Rahane has to exit. Movement in the air for Sangwan too
full on middle, not a half-volley, Smith shuffles across off and flicks it between the gap at square leg and midwicket

Sangwan follows the full ball with a lifter. Smith has been bounced out. This is a quick short ball rising towards throat. Smith is hustled for pace. He only manages a top edge, which is snaffled by short fine leg. Pune two down after one over. Happy return for Sangwan
full and swings away outside off, guided through backward point
back of a length and swings away outside off, played to point
back of a length and slanted down the leg side, Tiwary can't get bat on the glance

Tiwary has been given out lbw for a two-ball duck. This is very full, starts just outside off and swings back into Tiwary. He plays back and is rapped on the front pad. The tracker returns three reds. This was crashing into leg stump
short on off, Stokes hops and fends it back to the bowler
back of a length on off, played back to the bowler
straying into the pads, flicked to long leg
back of a length on off stump, punched into the covers
sublime drive from Stokes. A bit too full on off, Stokes eases forward and drives it straight down the ground
short and outside off, Sangwan hits the bat hard. Punched to cover again
back of a length on off, no room, pushed in front of mid-on
short of a length and zips through outside off, Sangwan is generating serious pace, but the line is very wide. Past the guideline. Stokes swishes and misses
picked off the pads to deep midwicket
Tripathi shuffles across off, this is short, chasing him. He jumps off his feet and fends the ball to leg
hip-high short ball outside off, loose, Stokes shimmies out and swats it away to the midwicket boundary
slower full  ball outside off, 111ks, Stokes is early into it, stabbing it to cover
dug in shorter and outside off, rushes Stokes for pace. He top-edges a pull to where midwicket would have been. He had just been sent to the deep
Tripathi looks to force the pace. He jumps outside off. This is on a back of a length and outside off, flat-batted to cover point
hip-high short ball on middle, pulled to short fine leg
back of a length on off, tip and run in front of mid-off

full and wide outside off, Stokes reaches out with hard hands for a drive and sends an outside edge flying to third man. Soni tumbles to his right in deep and stops the ball from rolling to the boundary
chest-high short ball outside off, Stokes picks up the length early. Swivels on the back foot and pulls it into the stands beyond long leg
back of a length and wide outside off, Stokes flashes it to the right of third man again
crackling shot from Tripathi. Back of a length and angling across off, Tripathi hits on the up, punching it square through the off side, wide of point
good length and outside off, guided straight to point now
back of a length and skids on middle and leg, cramps the batsman for room. He hops and fends it back to Sangwan
slower and fuller outside off, Stokes gets forward and plays a checked drive to cover
short and wide outside off, Stokes frees his arms, flat-batting it away between point and cover

Horrible mix-up. Stokes and Tripathi are nearly at the striker's end. Stokes uses his feet, yorks himself, and ends up digging the ball down towards long-on. Stokes takes off for the second. Tripathi took off as well, but stopped near the middle of the pitch. Stokes is annoyed. Finch swoops on the ball and nails the stumps at the non-striker's end with a rocket throw
left alone outside off
back of a length on off, punched back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line for one
front of the hand flipper, Stokes pushes away from the body and edges it past lone slip. Gets away
liberally tossed up outside off, Stokes presses forward and drives a single to long-off
Dhoni comes down the track, this is full on off stump, nurdled to midwicket
tossed-up legbreak just outside off, Dhoni gets forward and pushes to cover
Dhoni uses his feet again, the rookie legspinner holds his own. Tosses it on off, quietly played back
pitches around off and breaks away outside off, Dhoni gets forward to meet this full ball. Bunted through cover for one
pushed a bit too full and outside off, Dhoni lays into a drive and sends it clattering through extra cover. Thampi slides to his right in the deep, but that was always going for four
floated up outside off, not much turn, played to cover on the front foot
straighter one on off, played back to the bowler
flighted and full on off, Dhoni gets forward and pushes, can't beat cover
full and straight on middle, Dhoni plays it back to the bowler
short and slides across off, swishes and misses
short and outside off, flat-batted to cover
full and angled across off stump, front of the hand slider, Stokes spars at it and watches the ball beat the outside edge
full on leg stump, worked to the left of midwicket
flatter and quicker outside off, Dhoni jabs it straight to point
Dhoni uses his feet again, this is very full on off, played back to the bowler
skids on off, forced back to the bowler on the back foot
length and outside off, Stokes goes low and smokes it over midwicket with a violent slog-sweep
this one is bigger and straighter. Tossed up and width outside off again, Stokes mows it over the wide long-on boundary
flat dart on off, no room, hit back to Jadeja
might have been seam-up, hurled outside off, 104ks, punched down to wide long-off
short and wide outside off, Stokes cuts it away to deep cover
googly, full and breaks away around off, Stokes reads it and defends to cover
Stokes shapes for the reverse-sweep. Soni bowls a full-toss down leg, hit past point
Dhoni uses his feet, this is darted flatter and quicker. He is hit on the pad, but this is heading down leg
full-toss on off, pushed down to long-off
short and outside off, Dhoni slaps it to long-off for one
very wide outside off, full, Stokes reaches out and carves to deep point. Might have been an off-side wide had he left it
hip-high short ball outside off, swatted away to deep midwicket. Stokes brings up his second IPL fifty
short and wide outside off, Dhoni reaches out and guides it to point
back of a length and angled in on off, clipped away to deep midwicket
just short of a good length and outside off, solidly punched down to long-off
back of a length and angled in, Dhoni looks to work it across the line but is hit on the thigh
Stokes uses his feet, Smith floats it very full and wide outside off. The batsman reaches out for it and slices it away through backward point
Soni gives it plenty of air outside off, regulation legbreak pushed wide with Dhoni stepping out. He skews it over point off an outside edge
Dhoni uses his feet again, driven through the line to the left of long-off
pushed full and straight on off, played right back to the bowler
short and wide legbreak outside off, past the guideline
full and slides in on off, pushed back to the bowler
long-hop on the off stump, Dhoni rocks back and pulls towards deep midwicket. Thampi tumbles and gets his knee dug into the ground
length ball just a shade outside off, played back. Soni finishes with 4-0-16-0, did not concede a single boundary
off-stump yorker, dug out
slower ball, back of a length, punched just wide of cover
back of a length and angled in on off, pushed back
short of a length and outside off, forced to cover again
just short of a good length and outside off, slower ball, punched to long-on off the inside half
very full on off, whipped down to long-on. Time-out
Stokes runs down the track, Faulkner goes short and outside off, pulled to deep square leg
Finally, finally Dhoni tees off. This is short and outside off. He has room to free his arms. He bludgeons it over midwicket
pretty full on the pads, Dhoni hangs back and picks it off through square leg
fractionally short and wide outside off, Dhoni eyes the gap between the two men behind point. Guided away, Kishan dives to his left at backward point to stop the ball
short of a length and wide outside off, slower ball, Stokes waits and flat-bats it away to sweeper cover
very full and angled in on off stump, clipped away to wide long-on. 12 off the over
early signs are that he will. Dhoni runs down the track. Floated full and very wide outside off, past the guideline
full, slow and dips at leg stump, Dhoni is defeated and struck on the pad. The ball rolls to leg. Going down
slower length ball outside off, Stokes unleashes a clubbing swing and sends the white ball soaring into the stands beyond midwicket
Stokes backs away outside leg, this is full and wide outside off, Stokes reaches out and goes over the top. Crunched over extra-cover
slower, dipping full-toss on the leg stump, Stokes closes the face early and gets a leading edge to the right of the bowler
back of a length on middle and leg, yet another slower ball, tucked to deep midwicket
pitched up on off, solidly driven to long-off. 28 off the last two overs

Thampi has Dhoni holing out to long-off. Slower ball, from the back of the hand. Pushed full and very wide outside off. Fuller than Dhoni would have liked. He picked the change-up, but flat-batted it to McCullum at long-off
full and straight, picked off to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, sits back and punches to extra cover
another slower ball, 89ks, tickled behind square
bashed down the ground. Full and outside off, Stokes nails it over the bowler's head and beats long-on to is right
slower, back of a length and outside off, Stokes picks it, and punches to cover
near yorker, swings in on off, shovelled down to long-on
Baz runs in from long-on but this skier lands in front of him. Chjristian had no clue about this offcutter. He was into the shot too early and gets away
seam-up, short and wide outside off, Christian cuts it away to the right of a diving Faulkner at backward point
much better. Very full and bang on off stump, driven down to long-off
full-toss on middle, mowed away over midwicket. Smith runs across to his right from the deep, and pushes the ball back into the field of play. Keeps Stokes down to two
just short of a good length and outside off, flat-batted to cover
Stokes clears Baz at long-on. Low full-toss outside off, Stokes swings for the hills. Does not middle it. Gets the result he wanted, though

short and wide outside off, powerfully swatted away between deep midwicket and wide long-on. Jadeja tears across to his left from wide long-on, slides and pulls the ball back into the field of play. Sublime fielding from Jadeja. Saves two
slower back of a length ball on off, flat-batted fiercely down to long-off
slower full ball on off, 90ks, Christian picks it and shovels it away to deep midwicket
slower ball, 120ks outside off. Stokes manufactures all the pace. Just brute power. The length is short and outside off, flat-batted straight of long-off
length ball outside off, carved through the covers. Stokes gets himself back on strike.... and collapses at the non-striker's end. Looks like he is suffering from cramps

Stokes raises his maiden T20 hundred in style. What an innings. Million-dollar innings. Overpitched and outside off, Stokes sizes it up and flat-bats it through the covers. He swipes his bat on the floor and celebrates. Stokes, bad calf and all, is doing it for Pune
Stokes pre-meditates, aims a reverse sweep and misses. Takes it on  the pad and hobbles across for a leg bye
short and wide outside off, Christian cuts a single to sweeper cover
back of the hand slower ball on off stump, whipped down to long-on
Christian seals it for Pune with a six over square leg. Length ball, seam-up, angled in, Christian holds his shape and bludgeons it into the stands
